body.p: This Standard defines recoverable amount as the higher of an asset’s or cash‑generating unit’s fair value less costs of disposal and its value in use. Paragraphs 19–57 set out the requirements for measuring recoverable amount. These requirements use the term ‘an asset’ but apply equally to an individual asset or a cash‑generating unit.
